dc_title_s: A map of the continent of the East-Indies etc : containing the territories, settlements and factories of the Europeans, explaining what belongs to England, France, Holland, Denmark, Portugal, etc.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:18,000,000. Relief shown pictorially. On verso: 38.|20 x 42 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:18,000,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
